section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: The Purpose of the Venture needs to be clearly defined to outline the objectives, scope, and limitations of the joint venture. By stating that the Purpose will be determined by the Managers, it creates ambiguity and potential for conflicting interpretations or changes to the venture's scope without the explicit agreement of all members. This lack of a well-defined Purpose can result in uncertainty about the venture's activities and create disputes among the members.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The section describing the Capital Contributions contains a contradiction in the values assigned. For BorrowMoney.com, inc, the Agreed Value is marked as 'To be determined USD', implying that the value is not yet fixed, but in order to have a legal and biding contract, all details should be present from the onset of the contract. For JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go, there are two different values, one for $60,000.00 and one for $3,500,000.00 USD which does not make sense

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This section creates inconsistencies and ambiguities regarding the valuation of the Venture and a withdrawing Member's interest. By stating that the value of the Venture will be determined 'in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members' and that a withdrawing Member's interest will be determined 'at the discretion of the remaining members,' the contract lacks a clear and objective methodology for valuation.
